summary: The implementation successfully replaces MyMemory translation API with LibreTranslate (an AI-based translation service) in the PDF translator. The diff shows a new aiTranslator.ts utility implementing LibreTranslate API integration with fallback instances, chunk-based translation for large documents, and progress tracking. PdfTranslator.tsx was modified to use the new AI translator utility. The implementation includes comprehensive error handling, progress indicators, text extraction via PDF.js, and PDF generation with pdf-lib, covering all specified requirements.
